Articles.Content:
Just wondering if someone could make a crew tank from the mk3 fuel tank.

Now most people ask why I would need such a thing well I'll tell you why, in my opinion the mk3 parts make brilliant rover body's and my polar kerbin base will need a rover that can carry 7 kerbals 3 in the cockpit 4 in the crew tank. If someone could do this I'd be extremely grateful, just make it look like the mk3 fuel tank with a hatch no iva required.

Thanks,

Commander jebidiah
Anyone interested? there rep And a plane for it using mk2 parts

It's not to 100% what you're asking for, but worth a look: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65097-Mk3-Refit-Project-Beta-Release

Beta does really mean beta, some parts are clearly not finished, although I think the crew module does work.

Didn't TouhouTorpedo make a Mk3 expansion pack once? I think that's your best bet.

You won't get much help here since 0.26 will have a completely changed Mk3 line of parts.
